app_name: Groups Treatment Groups Apple Translate Magic Translator Translate
app_description: Download Magic Translator now and translate text voice and pictures in real time. In today s information explosion we are beginning to come into contact with more and more information in other regional languages. Whether it is in life or at work we must know quickly and accurately what the information means. Importantly Magic Translator will make language no longer a barrier allowing you to have more moments of ease. Key Features: 1. Support in more than 100 languages. 2. Support voice to voice dialogue. 3. Support scan translation in photos. 4. Support copy and share. Text translation: Just enter the text you want to translate you can not only get the translation result but also share the translated text. Voice translation: You need to turn on the microphone permission of the device just speak to the device and Magic Translator will automatically identify what you said. OCR translation: Whether it is taking a real time photo or selecting a photo from the gallery advanced optical technology will automatically extract the text content of the image for translation. You can switch between any of the following languages Afrikaans Albanian Amharic Arabic Armenian Azerbaijani Basque Belarusian Bengali Bosnian Bulgarian Catalan Cebuano Chichewa Malaui Chinese Corsican Croatian Czech Danish Dutch English Esperanto Estonian Filipino Tagalog Finnish French Frisian West Galician Georgian German Greek Gujarati Haitian Creole Hausa Hawaiian Hebrew Hindi Hmong Hungarian Icelandic Igbo Indonesian Irish Italian Japanese Javanese Kannada Kazakh Khmer Camboya Kinyarwanda Korean Kurdish Kurmanji Kyrgyz Lao Latin Latvian Lithuanian Luxembourgish Macedonian Malagasy Malay Malayalam Maltese Maori Marathi Mongolian Myanmar Burmese Nepali Norwegian Bokm√•l Odia Oriya Pashto Persian Polish Portuguese Punjabi Gurmukhi Romanian Russian Samoan Scottish Gaelic Serbian Shona Sindhi Sinhala Sri Lanka Slovak Slovenian Somali Spanish Sundanese Swahili Swedish Tajik Tamil Tatar Telugu Thai Turkish Turkmen Ukrainian Urdu Uyghur Uzbek Vietnamese Welsh Xhosa Yiddish Yoruba and Zulu. Download Magic Translator and you will experience unlimited translation and 100 free fun!
